nodes.text: Star Wars Omnibus: A Long Time Ago.... Volume 4

Star Wars Omnibus: A Long Time Ago.... Volume 4 is a Star Wars Omnibus-series trade paperback collecting issues 68-85, the Star Wars: Return of the Jedi (comics) mini-series, and Annual #3 of the Marvel Star Wars comic book series. It was released on August 3, 2011.

This volume collects over five hundred pages of classic Star Wars adventures! Luke Skywalker and his rebel friends battle the oppressive Empire in stories set shortly before and after the galaxy's restoration to a New Republic in Return of the Jedi.
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....

In stories set shortly before and after the galaxy's transition to the New Republic in the Return of the Jedi motion picture, Luke Skywalker and the Rebels battle the oppressive Empire. Join Luke, Princess Leia, Han Solo, Boba Fett, and many more classic-era characters in twenty-three tales of daring, action, heroism and friendship!

Collected here are issues #68 through #85, the King-Size Annual #3, and the original four issue adaptaton of Star Wars: Return of the Jedi from the Marvel Comics Star Wars series from the 1980's – nearly six hundred pages of action and adventure!
